content: this lovely crochet purse is the perfect accessory for weddings parties proms banquets or other important occasions it can be worn over shoulder or in hand as a clutch if you remove the chain strap the bag is made with a medium polyester rope yarn with 3mm diameter the bag is worked flap and is made of 3 pieces 1 large rectangle that will be fold over to form the flap and the bag body and 2 side pieces the main part of the bag is made using just simple single_crochet stitches while the flap stands out with a beautiful textured stitch pattern **don t miss a thing ** subscribe to my free newsletter 1 to stay updated with new free crochet patterns tutorials and other yarnie things follow me on instagram 2 follow my fb page myhobbyiscrochet 3 for daily free crochet pattern links share your projects and get advice in our facebook group my hobby is crochet 4 get more crochet inspiration in my pinterest boards 5 check out my youtube channel 6 1 https //landing mailerlite com/webforms/landing/n1x3g9 2 https //www instagram com/myhobbyiscrochet/ hl=de 3 https //www facebook com/myhobbyiscrochet ref=hl 4 https //www facebook com/groups/myhobbyiscrochet/ 5 https //www pinterest de/myhobbyiscroche/ 6 https //www youtube com/@myhobbyiscrochetblog
